lines.text: Grandpa, you are hitting on everyone that comes by here! People are scared to come to the temple!
It's that cat with the bald spot!
How rude! It's not a bald spot, you know.
The cat spoke! It spoke!
The rabbit on the moon pounded rice cakes.
The rice cakes were sticky.
They puffed up when I cooked them.
Go! Get out of this miserable place! Go and... find yourself a cool boyfriend or something...
You're the coolest, Mamoru.
Ami, Rei, Mako, Minako, they all died without kissing the people they loved, so I cannot allow myself that joy... I'm sorry Mamoru
[Mamoru about to kill Usagi]

[shouts]
Please stop! Please remember me, Princess Serenity of the past, and that perky odango-head Usagi
In the name of the moon, I will punish you!
Hey... that's my line!
In the name of the moon, you're punished!
That's my line, damn you!
Moon Tiara Action
Moon Prism Power! Make-Up!
If I become a demon, please don't hold back and kill me!
Urawa, the future is something you make happen on yourself. You wont become a demon if you have faith
So, who wants to give our lovely guests the "death sentence"?
Allow us, your majesty.
[light shines]
The DD Girls!
Sparkling wide pressure!
Knowledge is something you learn on your own, computers don't make you smart!
Shut the hell up!
